page.title: 14Housing-Hunters Hill Estate
page.content: We(3rd years at Belmont Jun.School) did a survey of this large estate in our catchment area.Our school was built in 1968(Juniors) & 1972 (Infants).The estate started in 1965 with houses built by Craigton Combined Securities Ltd.Most of the estate was built in the early 1970s by Minton Construction,George Wimpey,GCT Constr, Erscombe Properties,& other firms.The last houses came in 1976 (Pinedale Estates Ltd) but a shopping precinct was opened in 84 & a pub (J.W.Cameron) in 79.Most houses are detached 3-bed- room houses or bungalows.Not surpris- ingly most of our parents have recent- ly come here. 16 years is the longest that anyone has lived in Guisborough. The area seems to be popular; most people we asked mentioned their gardens or the surrounding forests as amenities they particularly liked.
